comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Frenz... Still in Anchorage. heading down the Kenai in minutes. cloudless this AM, and in the 60's. Absolutely beautiful. For DM; Saw the biggest fish I've ever seen outside Marineland yesterday from a bridge. Some kind of red salmon. Huge and FAST. Must've been 4 - 5 feet long. I had to hold Zack back (he doesn't have his license yet). A good sign, I hope. Stay cool, y'all!

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hey, Underwoods! Have fun and catch many big fish for the Frenz. Your envious pals...

comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: If the Tour riders get a rest day, then I want one too. See you tomorrow, frenz. -Adriana
